name: Lucky Moves
description:
You find yourself lost in a maze. And you have to reach the exit.

Every 4 seconds, your controls change to 1 out of the six control schemes.

Control Modes:

Normal:  WASD or arrow keys to move. It will be the default mode.

Inverted: Like the Normal mode, but up is down and left is right.

Turn Left: Like the Normal mode, but the controls are turned 90 degrees to the Left

Pew Pew/Ship: Left and right stay the same. But, the x and o buttons make you up and down.

Apple/Platformer: You get gravity, but you can't jump.

NPC Mode: You walk around randomly no matter what key you press.
